abilities.name: Psychic Zone
abilities.effect: Don't apply Psychic Weakness when Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) take damage from attacks.

attacks.name: Star Search
attacks.effect: Search your deck for an Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Psychic Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Star Shield-GX
attacks.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
